snippet: Sheriff Ross Mirkarimi of San Francisco pleaded guilty Monday to false imprisonment in a domestic violence case after reaching a plea deal.
abstract: Sheriff Ross Mirkarimi of San Francisco pleads guilty to false imprisonment in a domestic violence case after reaching a plea deal.
lead_paragraph: Sheriff Ross Mirkarimi of San Francisco pleaded guilty Monday to false imprisonment in a domestic violence case after reaching a plea deal.

headline.seo: Plea Deal For San Francisco Sheriff in Abuse Case
